program: Master of Science in Computer Science (MS)

sections.text: Stanford’s MS in Computer Science builds depth in a chosen area while ensuring breadth across core CS topics, preparing students for advanced industry or doctoral work.

items: Core and breadth requirements by track
GPA minimum of 3.0 in program courses
sections.text: Students complete at least 45 units with specific core and breadth requirements and maintain program GPA standards.

items: Strong quantitative background; CS bachelor’s not required
Online application with transcripts and materials
Foundation prerequisites as advised by department
sections.text: Applicants should demonstrate quantitative readiness; admission follows the department’s master’s guidelines.
Graduates pursue roles in software engineering, AI/ML, systems, and research, or continue to PhD study.
